Name: English
Menu.About.Title: About Kuriimu
Menu.About.Description:
Kuriimu2 is a general purpose game translation project
manager and toolkit for authors of fan translations and
game mods.
Dialog.ChangeLanguage.Caption: Changed settings
Dialog.ChangeLanguage.Text: The changes will only take effect after a restart.
Dialog.ChangeTheme.Restart.Caption: Restart
Dialog.ChangeTheme.Restart.Text: Please restart to apply the theme.

Dialog.UpdateAvailable.Text: Do you want to update from {0}-{1} to {2}-{3}?

Dialog.UnhandledException.Caption: Unhandled exception
Dialog.UnhandledException.Text.Close: An unhandled exception occurred. Refer to the log for more information. The application will be closed.
Dialog.UnhandledException.Text.NotClose: An unhandled exception occurred. Refer to the log for more information.

Dialog.LoadError.Caption: Load Error
Dialog.UnsavedChanges.Caption: Unsaved changes
Dialog.UnsavedChanges.Text.Specific: Changes were made to {0} or its opened sub files. Do you want to save those changes?
Dialog.UnsavedChanges.Text.Generic: Changes were made to one or more files. Do you want to save those changes?
Dialog.DependantFiles.Caption: Dependant files
Dialog.DependantFiles.Text: Every file opened from this one and below will be closed too. Continue?
Dialog.SaveError.Caption: Save Error
Status.Plugin.Load.None: No plugin could open the file.
Status.Plugin.Load.NoArchive: Plugin does not represent an archive.
Status.Plugin.State.Init.Error: The plugin could not be initialized.
Status.Plugin.State.Load.Error: The plugin could not be loaded.
Status.File.Load.FailureWithPlugin: File not loaded successfully with plugin {0}.
Status.File.Save.Closed: The given file is already closed.
Status.File.Save.NotLoaded: The given file is not loaded anymore.
Status.File.Save.NoChanges: The file had no changes and was not saved.
Status.File.Save.State.Error: The file could not be saved.
Status.File.Save.State.Reload.Error: The file could not be reloaded after saving.
Status.File.Save.Replace.Error: Some files could not be replaced.
Status.File.Save.Copy.Error: Some files could not be copied.
Status.File.Save.DestinationNotExist: New files can't be created when saving.
Status.File.Close.NotLoaded: The given file is not loaded anymore.
Status.Operation.Running: Operations are still running and the file cannot be closed.
Archive.Status.Add.Error: Some files could not be added successfully. Refer to the log for more information.

Dialog.ChoosePlugin.Header.Generic: Choose plugin to open the file with:
Dialog.ChoosePlugin.Header.Identificatio: Could not automatically determine plugin for opening this file, please choose manually:

By default only plugins that couldn't automatically determine if they support the file are shown.

SelectSearchDirectory: Select the directory to search through
